data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Harbin, Heilongjiang, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Harbin. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, may the churches in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Harbin you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Harbin, Heilongjiang, China has a population of 8,575,300.

We estimate Harbin has 650,532 people who might know Jesus, 138,533 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,786,235 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 650,532 believers in the county of Harbin with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.
